themes: lack of business and corporate engagement
decline in federal and corporate funding
key_phrases: Austin is a very difficult place to raise money
The business/corporate community is not engaged with the need
We do not have large foundations here who fund the arts
It is an old problem that has become very acute
corporate funding has declined in anticipation of a recession
ACME must move quickly but with all due intentionality to stabilize the arts ecosystem
We cannot lose another arts organization
barriers_identified: lack of engagement from business/corporate community
decline in corporate funding due to recession fears
solutions_proposed: ACME must move quickly but with all due intentionality to stabilize the arts ecosystem
